heading: Tuesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy north, clouds gradually decreasing south. Scattered snow showers diminishing, except remaining in the northern Green Mountains; another trace to an inch, mainly over high terrain. Lows 5 above to 5 below zero, cold hollows around 10 below. Winds light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly cloudy, except mostly cloudy northeast and in the Adirondacks. Highs in the low to mid teens north, mid teens to around 20 south. West winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Lows 5 above to 5 below zero, cold hollows around 10 below. Winds northwest near 10 mph, diminishing to light.
